body: Prerequisite: Half-undead subtype or undead type; Weakness: Members of this race are powerless in natural sunlight (this does not include light created by effects such as a daylight spell). A member of this race caught in natural sunlight cannot attack and is staggered.
name: Sunlight Powerlessness
